metadata.title: CVE-2023-23969 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Django 3.2 before 3.2.17, 4.0 before 4.0.9, and 4.1 before 4.1.6, theparsed values of Accept-Language headers are cached in order to avoidrepetitive parsing. This leads to a potential denial-of-service vector viaexcessive memory usage if the raw value of Accept-Language headers is verylarge.

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
